title: ReWiS: Reliable Wi-Fi Sensing Through Few-Shot Multi-Antenna Multi-Receiver CSI Learning
affiliations: Institute for the Wireless Internet of Things, Northeastern University

core_algorithms.name: Prototypical Networks for CSI Sensing
core_algorithms.description: First application of ProtoNets to WiFi CSI sensing, replacing MatNet approaches

core_algorithms.name: Multi-Diversity Framework
core_algorithms.description: Systematic exploitation of spatial (micro/macro), temporal, and frequency diversity

core_algorithms.name: SVD-based Dimensionality Reduction
core_algorithms.description: Novel SVD preprocessing maintaining subcarrier structure while reducing complexity

mathematical_models.name: Prototype Computation
mathematical_models.description: Class prototype calculation in embedding space

mathematical_models.name: SVD Decomposition
mathematical_models.formula: H'r = HrT × V where HrT = UΣV^T

mathematical_models.name: Loss Function
mathematical_models.formula: L(Qe) = -1/|Qe| Σ log(exp(-||fθ(qi) - pk||²) / Σ exp(-||fθ(qi) - pk'||²))
mathematical_models.description: ProtoNet training loss with Euclidean distance metric

embedding_function.features: 64 filters, 3x3 convolution, batch normalization, ReLU, 2x2 max-pooling

hardware.access_point: Netgear R7800 with Qualcomm Atheros chipset

datasets.preprocessing: SVD-based dimensionality reduction to 242x242 correlation matrices
datasets.train_test_split: 70% training, 30% testing in source environment E1

reliability_mechanisms.name: Spatial Diversity
reliability_mechanisms.description: Multiple antennas and receivers to combat fading
reliability_mechanisms.technical_details: Independent propagation paths reduce deep fade probability

reliability_mechanisms.name: Temporal Diversity
reliability_mechanisms.technical_details: Sliding window aggregation counteracts channel variations

reliability_mechanisms.name: Normalization
reliability_mechanisms.technical_details: Removes unwanted amplification and noise effects

technical_limitations: Requires initial few-shot calibration in target environment
key_contributions: First successful integration of few-shot learning with WiFi CSI sensing
Systematic multi-diversity framework for robust CSI collection
Novel SVD-based preprocessing maintaining CSI structure
Public release of large-scale multi-environment CSI dataset
future_research_directions: Extension to more complex activity recognition scenarios
Multiple human subject detection and tracking
